"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about muscles derived from pharyngeal arches. The documents provided describe the anatomy of the pharynx and its surrounding regions. This suggests that some muscles may be involved in this process. However, no specific information on muscle derivation from pharyngeal arches is provided. Looking at the potential choices, tensor tympani and orbicularis oculi are not described as being derived from pharyngeal arches in any of the provided documents.
